tweets.text:
In my third term, I will continue to carry Colorado voices to Washington to meet our urgent challenges, build an economy that grows for everyone, and protect the American West.

We have a duty to turn over a stronger economy and democracy to the next generation. https://t.co/yDbWIljosd
Hoosiers sent me here from the business world to get to work and get results. That's my promise to you every day. https://t.co/pmXEKIeeTU
When we let big corporations—whether Norfolk Southern or Silicon Valley Bank—run the economy, Ohio workers and their families always, always pay the price. https://t.co/51MsKVj7xk

Pennsylvanians who have been affected by the Norfolk Southern train derailment can visit my website for lists of resources regarding air and water testing, exposure, reimbursement, and other issues. 

Resource Page: https://t.co/g3YrIJryuq
The longer we wait to address Social Security insolvency, the larger and more expensive the solution becomes. Those who choose to do nothing support cutting benefits by 24% for all beneficiaries.

Senate Republicans just blocked my bill to protect women who travel for reproductive care and those who help them. They want to allow state legislators to reach across state lines to punish and control women. It’s absolutely outrageous. I won't stop fighting for women's freedom.
I’m a most blessed dad. https://t.co/z1ln1h24Fs

Serving my fellow Illinoisans in the Senate has been one of the greatest honors of my life. Today, I was sworn in for my second term—and I can't wait to keep working and keep delivering for working families. https://t.co/QRnxthKHkr

I am so happy to be home. I’m excited to be the father and husband I want to be, and the senator Pennsylvania deserves.

Pennsylvanians have always had my back, and I will always have theirs. https://t.co/mNrPOp08rB

🧵Russia has been in violation of New START for years, so this latest development should come as no surprise.

But make no mistake – this announcement is yet another dangerous example of Vladimir Putin trying to use nuclear saber-rattling to coerce other nations. (1/4) https://t.co/sMnCpKdFYA

I love Iowa & I love my work for the ppl of Iowa. Today, Iowa holds the number one spot in the Senate with my leadership. I look forward to continuing to deliver for Iowa. I’m humbled + grateful to be entrusted w the honor to continue working for our great state https://t.co/4YKJGuEtvj
RT if you agree that Mitch McConnell and Lindsey Graham shouldn't be allowed to make decisions about your body.

OPEC+ is reportedly reducing oil production & that’ll mean higher prices at the pump for U.S. consumers. The Biden admin needs to take the handcuffs off American energy producers so we can return to energy independence + dominance. https://t.co/cGjmfuIfX7
I am humbled and honored to continue serving Arizonans in the U.S. Senate. Now let’s get to work. https://t.co/2hc8SoZyQI

Louisianians fall down 7 times and get up 8—even when floods come on the heels of hurricanes. 

I saw that firsthand today when I caught up with heroes like Ms. Geraldine in Carencro. https://t.co/zCTt5MfZLM

Mike Lee Discusses: U.S.-Mexico Relations. 

“… fentanyl is an immense problem, and it's a problem of great urgency.” https://t.co/a4tnoMQinb

As the first Hispanic Senator to represent New Mexico in more than 40 years, I’m standing on the shoulders of giants who came before me. 

The challenges that New Mexico faces are great. But there's nothing we can't get through together. https://t.co/HqYDtHBQwF

The Bipartisan Infrastructure Bill represents a historic investment in West Virginia’s infrastructure – around $6 billion over the next 5 years. Here are some of the investments that the Bipartisan Infrastructure Bill will bring to #WV: https://t.co/pyRF3MyHox

This fight has been long and challenging, but I have not lost hope. We are closer than ever to delivering decisive climate action and we are going to keep fighting until we win. https://t.co/jITBVvJI6Z

For 40 years, my dad worked as a short-order cook and my mom cleaned houses. It’s because of their hard work and sacrifices that I stand here today, ready to preserve and fight for the American Dream. https://t.co/l3EalOr2vu

Since I came to the U.S. Senate, improving the lives of Nevadans and fighting for our state has been my #1 priority.

I'll work with anyone – Democrats, Republicans, Independents – to find commonsense, bipartisan solutions.

And it's working. https://t.co/S0tjX5N7Jm

We need to find out if @EmmanuelMacron speaks for Europe 

After his 6 hour meeting in China he told reporters that Europe should create distance with the U.S. & should not get involved in supporting America over China when it comes to Taiwan

https://t.co/xoFmUGkumH https://t.co/Ps718bXSyn

For some veterans, serving their country meant foregoing their own dreams so millions of Americans would have the opportunity to pursue theirs.
 
I'm proud to tell the story of Corporal Jimmy Sullivan of Foley and recognize him as our March “Veteran of the Month.” https://t.co/SDgVwimFSv

Republicans are weaponizing the debt limit for their extreme agenda — putting our entire economy at risk.

But we know the truth. They’ve shown their hand time and again: Republicans don't care about debt.

They care about protecting billionaires & big money special interests. https://t.co/Ll6eFXgJZn

TODAY: I’m introducing bipartisan legislation to cap insulin at $35 a month for EVERYONE.

Proud to partner with @SenJohnKennedy on this life-saving legislation. It’s past time to get this done. https://t.co/IepL05PvwD

tweets.text:
The @January6thCmte released our report today. As we approach the two-year anniversary of the attack, I hope you’ll find time to read this comprehensive accounting of what happened, why it happened and what we can do to make sure it never happens again. 

https://t.co/95zSFK2L02

"While there is little hope that President Biden will make an about-face on his failed border policies, there are still actionable steps that Congress and the administration can take to stem the flow of lethal narcotics."

Read my new Op-Ed in @thehill ⬇️

https://t.co/DUKGryEDvV

The Inflation Reduction Act is slashing Rx drug costs for seniors. To put it simply: it's a big deal. From a $2k cap on out of pocket Rx drug costs to a $35 monthly cap on insulin, we’re working to make sure folks on Medicare can afford the medicines they need. https://t.co/Pg8myyUJO7
China would be aiding and abetting war crimes were they to provide weapons to Russia. https://t.co/llC86ac1O4

Out of 435 members of Congress, I was ranked #2 for the most bills signed into law in the 117th Congress. 

I am honored to represent the great people of Nebraska’s 2nd district. Here’s to more hard work in the 118th Congress! https://t.co/X3TxlM5MAc

Over the past two years Americans have been put last. We’ve seen our stores & factories close, & our jobs shipped overseas—we need a great American comeback.

Under @SpeakerMcCarthy's leadership, @HouseGOP will reject Biden’s far-left policies & restore American prosperity.

I am honored and extremely grateful to be named Chairman of the @NatResources Subcommittee on Water, Wildlife, and Fisheries.

Let's get to work! https://t.co/tEfzFxgv4f

I'm proud to announce that my office has now recovered over $14 MILLION in owed benefits for #SacramentoCounty taxpayers.

Do you need help retrieving stalled tax returns or backlogged benefits? Learn how we can help YOU: https://t.co/7Lq7Sbkuli https://t.co/FR0WyuHghU
My @HouseGOP colleagues and I are ready to get to work and deliver on our #CommitmentToAmerica. https://t.co/G3HEH2EMxy
Alien Invasion: A Documentary on the Biden Border Crisis. https://t.co/MQgQSBrDKF

🚨 The Deep State is on notice. 

To any bureaucrat who violates Americans' Constitutional rights - we're coming for you, on behalf of the American people. https://t.co/fZA2qK1klz
Now it’s time to deliver on our promises. https://t.co/Ek1MS8ZusE

My colleagues on the other side of the aisle frequently use the terms “woke” and “critical race theory” in discussions about public schools. I asked one of them what those words mean, and wasn’t too surprised by his response (or lack thereof). https://t.co/wVR7lGNa3u

I’m honored that my @HouseGOP colleagues selected me to serve as @HouseVetAffairs chairman. It’s a humbling day for a guy who enlisted in the @USMC 44 yrs ago. To our veterans: know I'll continue fighting every day to ensure you receive the care, benefits & respect you've earned. https://t.co/HLbIZQ52S5

My dad came to America at 19, worked as a union laborer for 50 years, and made it possible for me to be the first in my family to go to college.

As the top Democrat on the Budget Committee, I'll fight every day to make sure our economy works for working families like mine. https://t.co/YWCMhQ4myf

It is an incredible honor that the people of Oklahoma’s Second Congressional District have entrusted me to be their voice in Washington. Our unsustainable deficit spending, broken borders, unchecked bureaucracy, and woke policies are undermining our Republic. 1/3

There is no justification for this draconian ruling from a Texas federal judge. 

The simultaneous Washington federal court decision leaves hope for reproductive rights—but we must ensure that our constitutional right to reproductive freedom is protected at all costs. https://t.co/vzpxfV8dJr

Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Google have spent over $150,000,000 in TWO years towards candidates and policy centers. 

It’s time to end Big Tech’s dominance. https://t.co/wsV90ALCBb

Fighting for working families is my life's work. 

It's why I joined the labor movement. And it’s why I just took an oath to serve the constituents of Illinois’ 13th Congressional District. 

Thank you for placing your trust in me to serve our communities. Let's get to work! https://t.co/5YNs0AVJTa

BREAKING: I’m excited to announce Fresh Freedom, a podcast cohosted by myself, @RepBrecheen, @RepEliCrane, @RepLuna, & @RepOgles.

Join 5 freshmen representatives as we give you a behind the scenes look inside the People’s House!

Links to Fresh Freedom available below. https://t.co/0cyvoE5o2m

The CCP’s ties to TikTok are more than just a national security threat—they’re a threat to every single American. In fact, the entire @HouseCommerce Committee was threatened with violence by a TikTok user just WEEKS ago. 

Every American should be frightened by this app. https://t.co/CtwmQaSmEv

I got my hands on a brand-new mint edition copy of @POTUS' 2024 Budget!

Tune in below to see what I found as I unboxed this new budget, include what it will do to lower costs for families, create jobs, protect Social Security and Medicare, and cut the deficit! 👇 https://t.co/5phIN8U7j4
RT if you agree ➡️ Parents should have a say in their child's education! 📒 #ParentsBillofRights

One life lost to gun violence is one too many. We have sacrificed our children to protect these weapons and yet we STILL have not implemented common-sense gun reform! I won’t stop fighting to put #KidsOverGuns. https://t.co/yzoc4krJlF

🚨 Today on the House floor, I sounded the alarm.

Extremist Republicans are using Texas as a testing ground for their most extreme, vile policies, with a plan to spread these across the country.

But that's not representative of Texas values. #TX35 #txlege https://t.co/5i6x4c3k3B

I’m proposing the first attempt in Congress to expand the Senate and reinstate the original jurisdiction of the Supreme Court. This bill would also increase representation in House and equalize the Electoral College.

Here’s the breakdown ⬇️ https://t.co/3rmcu03zrj

Ahead of the one-year anniversary of the @WBD merger, I joined @SenWarren, @RepCicilline, and @RepJayapal in asking the Department of Justice to re-examine the merger given WBD’s post-transaction behavior. (1/2)

https://t.co/R3ip3K1uM0 https://t.co/QqRWRdTMml

I had the opportunity to preside over the House & close the vote on the Protecting America’s Strategic Petroleum Reserve from China Act. I’m glad this effort received bipartisan support – we shouldn’t be sending our main competitor resources intended for national emergencies. https://t.co/mZFD0CcKTV

Serving the people of Rhode Island’s First District has been the honor of my lifetime.

The chance to lead the Rhode Island Foundation was unexpected, but it is an extraordinary opportunity to have an even more direct impact.

My full statement ⤵️
https://t.co/gVNOtlTgPk

Joe Biden’s $6.9 TRILLION budget proposal continues us on the downward economic spiral of more taxes, more debt, more inflation. 

House Republicans will FIGHT to stop this reckless plan by putting forward a budget that actually works FOR Americans, not against them.

As I listen to these #Jan6thHearings, I am proud to have introduced the first real impeachment articles against Donald Trump, to have boycotted his inauguration and State of the Unions, and to have never ever interacted with this illegitimate president. https://t.co/IUurlFuOhu

🚨PASSED🚨

The House passed the Protecting Speech from Government Interference Act. 

To protect the First Amendment, I introduced this legislation to stop federal employees from pressuring social media companies to silence Americans expressing views online.

Full statement👇🏼 https://t.co/Ep4aaObkVi
Sorry, you lose the right to complain about partisanship once you've fanned the flames of violent insurrection. https://t.co/BHjavZBM45

Don't miss out on the latest updates from my office.

Subscribe to receive my newsletter here ⤵️:
https://t.co/FEkVbISeRq https://t.co/9LD8nBXF1U

It was an honor to host @RepJeffries & @WhipKClark in #TX30 for my community swearing-in alongside @RepVeasey & former Rep. Eddie Bernice Johnson. I’m eternally grateful for my community for showing up and showing out! May the work continue. 🙌🏾 https://t.co/s4K844nm5k

As a combat veteran, I can tell you: I would never want to be armed with only a pistol against an assailant with an AR-15.

We can’t just arm our teachers. We need to pass common sense policies like an assault weapons ban to stop these attacks.

House Republicans have a bill that will grow our economy, strengthen our national security and ensure clean, affordable,  energy can power American homes and businesses. 

I spoke with @BoydMatheson about the importance of this legislation on Inside https://t.co/ukpgJBP8wj… https://t.co/mI2cQkRFHG

I know folks are concerned about rising prices on everyday items like gas & groceries. No one should have to worry about their budget getting squeezed even more.

Visit my Lower Costs webpage to learn more about resources & the solutions I am working on⬇️https://t.co/twnD5vba9g
I am Warren Davidson. I love this country with a soldier's passion. It is an honor to continue representing #OH08 in Congress. Thank you! https://t.co/yq5YZVpIPE

I am honored to be @HouseAgDems' Vice Ranking Member for the 118th Congress. 

As someone who grew up cropping tobacco to help make ends meet, standing up for farmers is a personal issue for me. I will use this role to ensure our growers can do what they do best—feed America. https://t.co/0u1KMTtfXt

In my first floor speech, I outlined my legislative priorities for TX-15.

☑️ Improving healthcare access
☑️ Life-saving Border Patrol equipment
☑️ Helping families and small businesses

Let's do this! 🇺🇸 https://t.co/N6wZLLxYuK

tweets.text:
Ship, Shipmate, Self: a simple lesson I learned in the Navy that guides my work down in D.C.

As your Congressman, the people of Western PA and our common good are at the heart of all I do. And I promise this: I'll always put you, your family, and our country first. https://t.co/fE4GvqeDrL

I will always fight to FULLY FUND Social Security, Medicare and Medicaid and NEVER support cuts to these vital programs. 

That’s my #CommonSensePlan for serving #NY04. https://t.co/QMXubGcari

I spoke against the #PollutersOverPeople Act. This GOP dirty deal is designed to distract us from the climate crisis, even as our children and grandchildren’s world could become uninhabitable. I voted no on these half-baked ideas that would burn up our planet. https://t.co/shJUs0DS7F

Championing Conservative Principles and Ushering In a New Republican Perspective to GOP House Leadership.

I have an announcement. 

WATCH BELOW! https://t.co/tMw3GMM7mF

IT’S OFFICIAL! After 50 years of dedicated and relentless advocacy, I’m thrilled to announce that today we have made #Castner4ever 🌼 a reality.

I can’t wait to welcome you all to Castner Range National Monument. https://t.co/3ItDGhz1JR
How is it that the top 1% evade $163,000,000,000 in taxes every year, but immigrants are called the freeloaders?

I will proudly co-sponsor this #WealthTax bill that would raise an estimated $2.75 TRILLION over 10 years from just 75,000 families. We could use this for badly needed, job-creating #infrastructure repairs to our schools, housing, transit, roads and more!
https://t.co/nhokLWIk0H

China must be banned from buying our farmland because American farmland belongs to American farmers — period. #IA04
https://t.co/dPY3U1Pxj2
https://t.co/MKk9TnozaR

Honored and proud to represent #TX07 in the 118th Congress. Ready to get back to work today #ForThePeople.

#HoustonProud https://t.co/wmqp0piOFA

Last week, with @ChrisMurphyCT, I introduced legislation to establish an Office of Gun Violence Prevention.

Our communities face gun violence daily- so, at the federal level, we must fight to end gun violence DAILY. https://t.co/ygDmA9bNgx
Episode 97 LIVE: Leftist Violence Again – Firebrand with Matt Gaetz https://t.co/sm6Q1xAFEX
Rep. Gallagher's statement on being selected by @GOPLeader to serve as Chairman of the Select Committee on China. https://t.co/Cxzoe141Qh

Today, I introduced the bipartisan bicameral 9/11 Responder and Survivor Health Funding Correction Act of 2023 alongside @SenGillibrand to close the @WTCHealthPrgm funding gap and safeguard 9/11 responder and survivors' access to healthcare for 9/11 related illnesses. https://t.co/QLbh4izsRx

Today’s retention problem is tomorrow’s recruiting crisis, & pay/quality of life are the biggest challenges to retention. 

I will remain the champion in Congress for our servicemembers, and fight until the end to get these heroes a pay bump to a minimum of $31,200 ($15/hr avg). https://t.co/oRlRDdehkf

I'm Robert Garcia and I'm proud to serve as President of the Freshman Class of Democrats in the 118th Congress. We're already delivering for the people and taking on our big challenges.

🧵⤵️ We've now launched official handles so follow us and get to know our class:

🚨📺 On @FoxNews: 

I met with President Tsai Ing-Wen of Taiwan this week.

Now, Communist China is threatening #Taiwan with military drills around the island.

America stands with the freedom-loving people of #Taiwan🇹🇼

We are not intimidated by the cynical regime in Beijing! https://t.co/r6ZeLMe2z1

So I went to work, making the case to my colleagues that we can’t put Big Pharma priorities over good jobs in a rural community that needs them. I'm glad to report we got it done, protecting 100s of jobs in The County.

Read more here: https://t.co/0ZQGtTQesc

#mepolitics

Thank you NY-10, for trusting me to represent you in Congress. I am humbled by this privilege and can’t wait to get to work. 

Follow along our new official account for updates on what we’re doing in New York’s 10th District and on Capitol Hill!
2 bottle feeds and multiple diaper changes on the Democratic cloak room floor. This speaker vote is taking forever! https://t.co/4eBfYBPhqs

Members of the Mexican Congress participating in the “Mexico-Russia Friendship Committee” should not be allowed to enter, travel, or invest in the US. 

I urge @SecBlinken & @SecMayorkas to revoke their visas and any foreign official that does not condemn Russian aggression. https://t.co/USscy50KOl

Gab is like Facebook but with free speech, anonymity, and a parallel economy of businesses who share our American values.
The company is owned and run by Christian Americans, and the terms of service is the First Amendment.

Join me today!

https://t.co/0sPkr1NgFC https://t.co/TlO4wAO1EV

We’re proud to represent our communities in south Louisiana, and your opinion matters to me. 

Please take a moment to let us know the topics and issues that matter most to you – and feel free to share with other folks, too. 

Take our survey here: https://t.co/qXcMg3L5K8 https://t.co/r92phTNLO0
#GoodTrouble #NecessaryTrouble https://t.co/enR4Y0hjbv

🚨🚨🚨 BREAKING: Border Patrol Chief Ortiz contradicts Secretary Mayorkas and admits the truth: 

DHS does NOT have operational control over our southern border. https://t.co/YmpVy0t6c1

Today and everyday is 1776.

Never give up our freedoms.

Never let the left steal them away.

Be a watchman on the wall and stay on guard every single second of every single day because the left will stop at nothing until they destroy our faith, our families, and our freedoms.

Today, I stood proudly with grassroots groups, youth advocates, and environmental justice community leaders from across the nation as I re-introduced the A. Donald McEachin Environmental Justice For All Act. https://t.co/n0HGkBwzcB

It's an honor to be named Chairman of @GOPOversight's Subcommittee on National Security, the Border, and Foreign Affairs.

I will fight to shine a light on the border crisis, support our veterans, and promote the interests of the American people worldwide.

Defending the conscience rights of healthcare providers should be of great interest to all Americans, and is of grave importance to me as a physician, especially in light of recent failures to do so by the Biden Administration. https://t.co/RIUMyx3zXx

Last night, I voted NO on sending another $40 billion of your tax dollars to Ukraine. 

I will not support sending billions overseas when mothers in America can’t feed their children.
The federal taxpayers, the American taxpayers who fund the government, are sick and tired of out-of-control spending.

Attention US residents with property in Canada:

We are fighting against the new 1% property tax on non-Canadians. We need data to advance the fight.

Please fill out the following survey and share with others: https://t.co/RRdzHhuown

It’s official: I’ve held an in-person town hall in ALL 20 counties in #IA01!
 
Sky high prices and the border crisis are top of mind for Iowans right now—we need commonsense solutions to get our country back on track. 

Read more: https://t.co/YSZTnABxi8 https://t.co/T0Muzv0QaI

Every day, senseless gun violence impacts families all across the country in many of our communities. This historic investment in community violence prevention programs will reduce crime and break the cycle of violence. #safercommunties https://t.co/fTuxvywrKD
Sworn in ✅ https://t.co/QJPXFSmjgZ

House Democrats are putting #PeopleOverPolitics and working to lower costs, create better-paying jobs, and build safer communities. Republicans voted against these policies, time after time after time. https://t.co/VRNZ1aPOwX

No matter what your politics are, no American should stand for the weaponization of our criminal justice system for a political agenda. Not to mention the millions of tax dollars lost and hundreds of hours wasted that should be focused on the crime wave in NYC. https://t.co/25rvT4qGJE
A military officer reached out to me tonight: “Biden’s speech on the balloons was all lies”

tweets.text:
I will continue monitoring the cleanup efforts in East Palestine and question those responsible regarding the quality of the air, water, and soil in the village. 

Our work is not done until EVERY East Palestine resident feels safe in their home. https://t.co/rxrzSTkOqZ

My office is accepting submissions for this year’s Congressional Art Competition. Enter your work for a chance to have it displayed here in the U.S. Capitol.

Find out more on my website ⬇️
https://t.co/kufSc65nQZ https://t.co/AQ9aif3gmV

Be sure to check out my other accounts!

📝 https://t.co/6BMJg36I3b
📸 https://t.co/DybaP9hvZY
🎥 https://t.co/aaprlgiZlC

We need a federal government that prioritizes the health and well-being of our communities over Big Oil.

I'm voting no on the Polluters Over People Act because it would roll back bipartisan progress Congress made last year toward an economy built on clean energy. https://t.co/ymMxOKmMpc

I'm honored to be appointed by @RepJeffries as Ranking Member of the Select Committee on Strategic Competition Between the U.S. and the CCP

Read my full statement here: https://t.co/fqnhTiNeII

🎨Calling all creative high school-aged students who live or attend school in #WA02 🎨

Submit your artwork to be considered for the 2023 Congressional Art Competition. This year's deadline is Monday, May 1, at 5 p.m. PT.  @conginst 

For more details 🖼️⬇️
https://t.co/AMFBJWm0TZ https://t.co/TcZpwsHxEN

Women of color have more political power than ever before. We are Governors, Senators, Attorneys General, and Members of Congress. I stand with all of my sisters in Congress and across the country – we're not backing down and we aren’t going anywhere. https://t.co/VKAKbIEkDD
Be sure to sign up for my newsletter to learn more about my work in Washington and throughout our district! #FL15 https://t.co/vNPrth3ycI

Republicans want to control what books you read & what history you learn. 

They want to control who you are and who you love. 

They want to control our bodies.

They want to control everything except what would prevent mass preventable deaths of children. https://t.co/dPadf3C4Yi

🚨Big News🚨

I've been named the #10 most bipartisan member of the U.S. House and the #1 most bipartisan from Nevada. I ran for Congress to cut through partisan dysfunction and gridlock. I'm proud to lead in bringing Democrats and Republicans together to deliver on that promise. https://t.co/C1Uv1BYqqt
Click HERE to subscribe: https://t.co/7k4KIEuLon https://t.co/DwFnsH2WmK
I support 45! https://t.co/U7XbD2PJ1D

A judge cited the Comstock Act from 1873, which was ruled unconstitutional by SCOTUS in 1983, to block a @US_FDA approved drug. Whether you agree with its usage or not, that's not your decision. It is the FDA’s decision. Women are watching, and they deserve better.

.@HouseGOP has solutions to fix what Democrats broke.

Under one-party rule, Democrats have fueled inflation, weakened our economy & made us all less safe.

Together, we can begin to get America back on track.

Learn more about our #CommitmenttoAmerica 👇

https://t.co/XfKnVbxOWh https://t.co/W454VQBbNk

China is using us as a doormat by not living up to their end of the Phase One trade deal.
U.S. must either force China to comply with their end of the agreement or punish them for failing to do so. 

That's how deals work.

Read more in my opinion piece: https://t.co/nXye0RZyyO

In my first Congressional term I introduced and cosponsored 442 bills, brought over $524.8 million to the Triad, and returned over $5.2 million to constituents. It's my honor to serve you in Congress. 

Looking forward to working for the people of #NC06 in the 118th Congress. https://t.co/GuKlTgPGCd

With another storm hitting our region, please stay safe and see the list of resources on my website  ⬇️
https://t.co/O1bfUaWJ1c

Here we go again — an outrageous abuse of power by a radical DA who lets violent criminals walk as he pursues political vengeance against President Trump. 

I’m directing relevant committees to immediately investigate if federal funds are being used to subvert our democracy by… https://t.co/elpbh7LeWn
Men have no place in women's sports.

Republicans might have the gavel but we have an incredible class of freshmen who are going to fight for working and middle class families and our democracy. 

Love this crew.

And ready to accomplish great things for America with this crew. https://t.co/OnXRz45Qqx
I just introduced my first bill of the 118th Congress to ban China and our adversaries from purchasing U.S. farmland. It's time to put America First! https://t.co/LOlu16WPo3

Attention high schoolers in southeast Iowa! 

My office is now accepting submissions for the 2023 Congressional Art Competition! 

You can find more information here: https://t.co/h1S0uOGqwv https://t.co/NC94WX2Uz0

I was part of the team that conducted the first successful overland rescue mission of Americans from Afghanistan after the withdrawal of U.S. troops. 

Read my full op-ed on Biden's botched Afghanistan withdrawal here: https://t.co/CcPa5TmLdH

Be sure to subscribe to my e-newsletter to stay up to date with my work to deliver results for Upstate New York!

tweets.text:

This year, our constituent liaisons opened 1,800 cases, helping our neighbors in The Bronx and Queens navigate federal services like stimulus checks, immigration filings, PPP loans, Social Security, Medicare, and more. https://t.co/URGAQ1N1jc

(1/10)

First up: Barista at Dogwood Coffee Shop ☕️ https://t.co/G3hx6wMP0A

Constituent casework is at the heart of Team Owens. From assisting with passport renewals to securing VA benefits and navigating federal agencies, we're here to serve you. To access a wide range of resources, visit https://t.co/REkdD5fvLa or call (801) 999-9801. https://t.co/CiojR727Sd

Representing and working for San Diego in Washington D.C. is an honor.  I'll continue fighting for cleaner air and water, for safe communities, for housing and jobs, and for our democracy. 🇺🇸

Women are not the property of their State, so they can travel between them for any reason they damn well please.

It’s because of Biden’s war on American energy.

My heart breaks for the victims of this senseless tragedy. Chelsea and I pray for those immediately impacted and the entire community as we grieve the loss of precious life. I am extremely thankful for the quick response of the MNPD, Nashville Fire Department, and emergency and… https://t.co/FH5ipW8Xpp

Today, I'm joining a few of my colleagues in proposing around $1 trillion in cuts to wasteful, discretionary spending. 

We must work to shrink Washington and grow America for future generations. https://t.co/Reuwwt9LV6

How can my colleagues on the other side of the aisle continue to do nothing while children are being killed in their schools?

These senseless acts of gun violence continue to happen over and over again, and we've got to take action. https://t.co/njTOqY1sDn

"A fundamental transformation of this House to ensure that the people can be represented by their representatives."

"That's the point." https://t.co/wwfRGUTkyf
I am honored to have been appointed by Democratic Leader @RepJeffries to serve as Ranking Member of the Select Subcommittee on the Coronavirus Pandemic. (1/2)

Following the outrageous decision in TX, @RepFletcher and I are reintroducing our bill to protect access to abortion medication nationwide.

The GOP is hellbent on ripping away reproductive freedom.

We will continue to fight back, and the American people will stand with us. https://t.co/PeQyb9ZjJg
Happy #OpeningDay & let’s go @Mets!! https://t.co/pKQulqpiG9

🚨 BREAKING—Just introduced the Lower Energy Costs Act to unleash American energy production & cut Biden's insane permitting red tape so families can see lower prices.

Now Dems will have to go on record & say whether they're for lower energy costs or not. https://t.co/b6mpa3xPf2
Today, I am making good trouble. #bansoffourbodies https://t.co/rKEhcodpYd

It was so great to be in (a snowy) Roslyn this week to talk about the federal funding I was able to secure for a project that will create a more resilient forest around Roslyn. This work will also help prevent catastrophic wildfires. Watch below. https://t.co/MNGyQygRQH

Today, I published an op-ed in @TheHill, where I discussed why defending and protecting the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP) in this year’s farm bill is critical for the well-being of America’s families.

Read More: https://t.co/5QRw4DELPQ https://t.co/yjF5fyZYLK

NEWS: I just unveiled the Richard L. Trumka Protecting the Right to Organize Act alongside House and Senate leaders. We know that when workers can form a union they have:
 
✅Bigger paychecks
✅Better benefits
✅Safer working conditions https://t.co/YIUyQK9fU6

Waste, fraud, and improper payments in federal programs have been a growing problem for decades. 

Assessing the level of abuse in COVID-19 relief is critical to becoming better stewards of taxpayer dollars. https://t.co/wXN3IicuIb

Today, with enormous pride and endless gratitude for those who marched here before me, I will be standing at the foot of the Edmund Pettus Bridge in Selma, Alabama to announce the introduction of #HR4, the John R. Lewis Voting Rights Advancement Act, in the 117th Congress. https://t.co/DYmwzORMg0

Did you know that I send out a weekly newsletter?

Interested Idahoans can signup to receive up-to-date information about the work being done in Congress.

Sign up here: https://t.co/E5FqPHyMpz

Serving the people of Washington's 9th is my top priority.  

I’m proud to have secured over $24M in FY '23 for 15 community projects across #WA09 that will invest in affordable housing, health care, workforce development, public safety, small business, local economy, and more. https://t.co/0HCQeVTW1x

🚨🚨Secretary Yellen just admitted before @WaysandMeansGOP that 90% of new audits under the Inflation Act will be on families and small businesses, not "billionaires and tax cheats." 

That is exactly why @HouseGOP passed my bill with @RepSteel to rescind this funding. ⤵️ https://t.co/nqmslEo4t0

.@WaysandMeansGOP went to Petersburg, WV to hear directly from working Americans in Appalachia about the state of the American economy.

Folks are struggling in Biden’s economy. It's time to end Democrats’ welfare for the wealthy agenda and get to work for working families. https://t.co/qJJEckihU4

I just got off the House floor where I finished giving my first floor speech.

As your trusted neighbor in Congress, I am focused on delivering results and common sense solutions for #IL17.

Take a listen. https://t.co/YOaIa4uqop

Proud to work with @POTUS to ensure the State of the Union is STRONG!

📃 Had the most productive Congress in 50 years
💵 Inflation fell 6 months in a row
🦺 Lowest unemployment in 50 years
🏥 Record Obamacare enrollment
🧳 Record small biz starts

The future is bright! #sotu2023 https://t.co/UBiH7fTl73
🚨 TODAY, I’m reintroducing my bipartisan legislation to ban Members of Congress, their spouses, and their dependent children from trading individual stocks while serving the American people.

What a year! As 2022 draws to a close, I’m proud and honored to fight for New Mexico in Congress and the priorities and dreams of our communities. Check out all that we’ve accomplished this year: https://t.co/Nc2CXHEJq8
As long as I am in Congress, I will NEVER let socialism come to the United States. https://t.co/xltJ73SCMO
💙💙💙A Very Special Announcement💙💙💙 https://t.co/hCB9KJminK
RT if you agree that biological MEN don’t belong in WOMEN’S sports.

My office worked hard to secure $16.4 million in federal funding for projects that respond directly to urgent needs in #MI11. We worked in lockstep with local elected officials and know the impact this funding will have on every single one of our communities! https://t.co/r7y1hsI4b9

Today, I introduced the BAH Restoration Act with @RepDonBacon and @SenatorWarnock to make housing more affordable for servicemembers and their families on and off base.

Meeting their basic needs should be a #nationalsecurity priority.

https://t.co/NKr2rm75Wu

The data is in & the time is now to modernize work culture for the better. I'm reintroducing the 32-Hour Workweek Act to allow workers to begin reclaiming their time, and their lives, with no loss of pay. https://t.co/rt7SoAeylD

The cost to replace every lead pipe in our country? $60 billion.
